Barbara Liskov

Biography

Barbara Liskov, n√©e Barbara Jane Huberman, turned into born on November 7, 1939, in California. She earned her BA in arithmetic on the university of California, Berkeley in 1961. in place of pass immediately to graduate college, she took a process on the Mitre organization in which she learned that she turned into a herbal at laptop programming. After a 12 months at Mitre, she moved to Harvard to work on computer translation of human languages.

She then determined to go back to school and carried out once more to Berkeley, but additionally to Stanford and Harvard. In 1968 she have become one of the first women within the usa to be presented a Ph.D. from a computer technology branch when she changed into provided her degree from Stanford college. At Stanford, she labored with John McCarthy and turned into supported to paintings in synthetic intelligence. the topic of her Ph.D. thesis become a laptop software to play chess endgames for which she advanced the crucial killer heuristic.

Liskov is a member of the countrywide Academy of Engineering, the national Academy of Sciences and a fellow of the american Academy of Arts and Sciences and of the association for Computing machinery (ACM). In 2002, she was identified as one of the top girls faculty contributors at MIT, and most of the pinnacle 50 faculty contributors inside the sciences in the U.S. In 2002, discover magazine diagnosed Liskov as one of the 50 maximum essential women in technology.
